name: GoTo Marketers Inc.
description:
We extend your marketing department's ability to execute and deliver so you can focus on your business. 
We align sales and marketing so you can reduce your sales cycle and generate more opportunities. 
Lower your costs, improve your results and have peace of mind knowing your marketing engine is firing on all cylinders.
Services offered 
Website design - Website Management - Customer Success stories and testimonials - White Papers - Reporting and analytics - Blogging - PR support - Videos - film and animated - Product and market messaging - Graphic design Branding- Google Adwords management- Display advertising - Marketing Automation - Buyer journey mapping - Lead nurturing campaigns - Lead Generation Services - Sales Enablement - SEO Services - Social Media for Twitter, FaceBook and LinkedIn - Community and influencer outreach - Project management - Event management support - Goto Market planning - Analyst Relations - Product management support - Part time CMO
